title: As a blogger, how do you decide what content would be enhanced with a video? - Quora

response.answer_text: I suggest go with current affairs as it has high chance of grabbing the attention. Meanwhile you can check out my blogs i blog about things in which people are interested more. You can make video out of this post with your voice over and put some images and make it slide show.
